entry.title: Demystifying Vaccination Metrics

entry.title: The Next Cyberattack Is Already Under Way
entry.quote: Amid a global gold rush for digital weapons, the infrastructure of our daily lives has never been more vulnerable.

entry.title: Nextdoor Is Quietly Replacing the Small-Town Paper
entry.quote: While Facebook and Twitter get the scrutiny, Nextdoor is reshaping politics one neighborhood at a time

entry.title: 20,000 honey bees took over a tech company’s empty office during lockdown
entry.quote: For amidst the building’s abandoned desks and silent phones, 20,000 honey bees were hard at work, building a hive filled with 10 gallons’ worth of honey, beeswax, and pollen,

entry.title: Jeff Bezos Exits Stage Right
entry.quote: Amazon has a huge advantage in both digital and physical logistics; that’s better than a moat, it’s two moats. It’s a moat surrounded by a ring of fire with a dragon inside.
